participant.browser.title: Event

participant.registration.section.name: Registration
participant.registration.section.title: Here you can register yourself and your companions.
participant.registration.section.subtitl: Afterwards you will get a QR-Code to your E-Mail, which you can show at the entrance to speed up the registration process.
participant.registration.complete: Registration complete. You should soon receive an E-Mail from us.
participant.companions.section.title: Accompanied by...
participant.confirmation.section.name: Confirmation
participant.confirmation.section.subtitl: We've sent this QR-Code to the E-Mail
Please be ready to show it at the entrance of this Event.
